short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An index to publicly available web services and XML data sources provided by the US government

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: USGovXML.com is an index to publicly available web services and XML data sources that are provided by the US government. USGovXML.com indexes data sources from all 3 branches of government as well as its boards, commissions, corporations and independent agencies.  Source code snippets demonstrating the use of some of the data sources are provided.
